articles.title: In pictures: America chooses Biden
articles.description: Joe Biden will be the 46th president of the United States, CNN projects, denying Donald Trump a second term in office. A victory in Biden's native Pennsylvania put the Democrat over the 270 electoral votes needed to secure the presidency.
articles.content:
President-elect Joe Biden is joined by family members after he gave a speech in Wilmington, Delaware, on Saturday, November 7.
Updated 11:00 PM ET, Sat November 7, 2020
President-elect Joe Biden is… [+1389 chars]

articles.author: Maeve Reston and Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: President-elect Joe Biden seeks to unite nation with victory speech
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden speaks to a deeply divided nation Saturday night, making a plea for unity after four years of turmoil and conflict fomented by President Donald Trump.
articles.content: (CNN)President-elect Joe Biden will speak to a deeply divided nation tonight, making a plea for unity and understanding after four years of turmoil and conflict fomented by President Donald Trump, wh… [+8553 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Gandel
articles.title: YouTube won't take down video falsely claiming Donald Trump won the election
articles.description: Not removing videos with false information could sow doubts about the election and even incite violence, critics say.
articles.content: YouTube is choosing not to take down a video claiming that Donald Trump won the 2020 presidential election, highlighting what its digital media critics call a more permissive approach to allowing mis… [+5741 chars]

articles.title: Trump will lose his Twitter ‘public interest’ protections in January
articles.description: Twitter has confirmed that President Donald Trump will no longer be considered a world leader whose rule-breaking tweets are still allowed on the service.
articles.content:

articles.title: President Trump is defeated: the timeline is restored
articles.description: President Trump just lost the election to Joe Biden. Now it’s time to restore our timeline — and reclaim some joy.
